original_text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:
korean_text: 모든 일을 그의 뜻의 결정대로 일하시는 이의 계획을 따라 우리가 예정을 입어 그 안에서 기업이 되었으니

sentences.original_text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance
of him who worketh all things
after counsel of his own will
